info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 25 at 2:16PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Snow Across The Interior Through Tuesday... Areas of light to moderate snow is expected to move over the Eastern Interior into Tuesday with additional accumulations into Tuesday morning. Most of the Interior can expected a total of 2 and 4 inches of snow by Tuesday. Slightly higher amounts of 3 to 6 inches are possible along the Dalton Highway into the southern Brooks Range. In Fairbanks, 1 to 2 inches of additional snowfall is possible. Falling snow and breezy winds overnight may lead to periods of reduced visibility.
